title: Did TV Chef Nigella Lawson Mispronounce ‘Microwave’?
subtitle: Internet users reacted with a mix of bemusement and delight at video clips taken from Lawson's BBC series in December 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In a December 2020 television episode, Nigella Lawson wildly mispronounced the word "microwave."
